AppRelatedStrings.EfMigrationAddPrompts: dotnet ef migrations add InitialPrompts -o Data/Migrations --context PromptsDbContext --project ./src/InPrompts.Prompts -s ./src/InPrompts.Web
AppRelatedStrings.EfMigrationAddUsers: dotnet ef migrations add InitialUsers -o Data/Migrations --context UsersDbContext --project ./src/InPrompts.Users -s ./src/InPrompts.Web
AppRelatedStrings.EfMigrationRemovePrompts: dotnet ef migrations remove --context PromptDbContext --project InPrompts.Prompts -s InPrompts.Web
AppRelatedStrings.EfMigrationRemoveUsers: dotnet ef migrations remove --context PromptDbContext --project InPrompts.Prompts -s InPrompts.Web
